window.title: AI-Kompanions
window.about_text:
AI Kompanions 
Version 1.0 

A multilingual AI chat application

dialogs.reset_message: Are you sure you want to reset the conversation?
dialogs.shutdown_message: Are you sure you want to quit?
dialogs.confirm_exit_message: Are you sure you want to exit?
dialogs.delete_recording_message: Are you sure you want to delete this recording?
dialogs.api_key_changed_message: The API key has been changed successfully.
dialogs.edit_message_instruction: By editing your message, a new conversation branch will be created.
dialogs.branch_name_placeholder: e.g., 'Alternative approach' or leave empty for auto-naming
dialogs.delete_message_confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete this message? 
The AI response will also be deleted. 

Deleted content can be recovered from the archive.
dialogs.delete_branch_confirm:
Are you sure you want to delete the branch '{branch_name}'? 

Deleted branches can be recovered from the archive.
dialogs.reset_conversation_confirm:
Are you sure you want to reset this conversation? 
All messages will be cleared. 

The conversation can be recovered from the archive.
dialogs.permission_microphone_message: To record audio messages, AI-Kompanions needs microphone permission.
dialogs.permission_microphone_step3: 3. Scroll down and enable for this app

messages.please_wait: Please wait for the current response before sending another message
messages.input_required: Please enter a message or record audio

SBV2.title: Style-Bert-VITS2
SBV2.description: Expressive Japanese voice synthesis with rich emotional range. Produces natural-sounding speech with accurate pitch accents and nuanced tone variations that bring characters to life.
SBV2.info: Voice generation may take a few extra seconds due to the high-quality synthesis process.

VOICEVOX.title: VoiceVox
VOICEVOX.description: Popular Japanese TTS featuring a diverse cast of unique character voices. Each voice has its own distinct personality and speaking style, from energetic to calm.

COQUI.title: Coqui TTS
COQUI.description: Clean, natural English voice synthesis. Delivers clear and pleasant speech that's easy to understand, ideal for everyday conversations.

ELEVENLABS.title: ElevenLabs
ELEVENLABS.description: Premium AI voice synthesis with exceptional clarity and emotional depth. Supports multiple languages with human-like intonation that adapts to context.
ELEVENLABS.warning: Usage is limited on the free tier. Heavy use may require a subscription.
ELEVENLABS.api_key_steps:
1. Visit elevenlabs.io and sign in or create an account
2. Go to the Developers section
3. Click the API Keys tab, then click + Create Key
4. Give it a name and set these permissions:
   ‚Ä¢ Text to Speech: Enabled
   ‚Ä¢ Voices: Read
5. Copy your API key and paste it here

OPENROUTER.title: OpenRouter
OPENROUTER.description: Gateway to multiple AI personalities and styles. One key gives you access to various AI models, letting you explore different conversation experiences.
OPENROUTER.api_key_steps:
1. Visit openrouter.ai
2. Create an account or sign in
3. Click 'Create API Key'
4. Set a name, credit limit, and expiration date
5. Copy your API key and paste it here

OPENAI.title: OpenAI (ChatGPT)
OPENAI.description: The widely-recognized AI behind ChatGPT. Delivers polished, well-rounded responses with excellent language understanding across many topics.
OPENAI.api_key_steps:
1. Visit platform.openai.com
2. Create an account or sign in
3. Click 'Get Started' or go to 'Quick start'
4. Click 'Create an API Key' then 'Create a new secret key'
5. Set a name and permissions (select 'All' for full access)
6. Copy your API key and paste it here

services.tts_description: Voice synthesis services that convert text to spoken audio
services.llm_description: AI providers that power conversations and text generation
services.tts_selection_hint: Browse available voice synthesis services for your characters. Services that require an API key can be configured here.
services.llm_selection_hint: Choose an AI provider for conversations. If you're unsure, we recommend starting with the highlighted service ‚Äî it offers a free tier and fast responses.
services.no_key_required_description: This service works out of the box without any configuration.
services.key_required_hint: Set up this service's API key in the Services tab.
services.how_to_get_key: How to get an API key

errors.invalid_key: API key is invalid or has been revoked
errors.api_error: Could not reach service. Check your connection.
errors.rate_limited: Rate limited. Please try again later.
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Check your connection.
errors.no_validator: No validation available for this service

warnings.quota_exceeded: Key valid, but quota exceeded. Check your billing.
warnings.rate_limited: Key valid, but rate limited. Try again later.
warnings.low_credits: Key valid, but low credits remaining.

api_keys.notice_key_shown_once: Your API key will only be shown once. Save it somewhere safe.

characters.select_language_placeholder: Select a language to see characters

archive.title: Archived Content
archive.select_character: Select a character to view archives
archive.intro_description: Your archived content is organized into two categories. Branches are complete conversation paths that were replaced when you edited or regenerated messages. Individual messages are specific exchanges that were removed during conversation editing.
archive.no_archives_hint: No archived content yet. Archive branches or messages from chat to see them here.
archive.restore_confirm: Restore this branch to your conversation history?
archive.delete_confirm:
This will permanently delete this archived content.

This action cannot be undone.
archive.branch_preview_description: This is a read-only preview of an archived conversation branch. {count} found. To continue this conversation, restore the branch first.
archive.branches_selection_hint: Select a branch to preview its conversation. You can restore or permanently delete branches from the preview.
archive.messages_selection_hint: Select a message to view its full content. You can restore or permanently delete messages from the preview.
archive.message_preview_description: This is a read-only preview of an archived message. To continue the conversation from this point, restore the message first.

definitions.tts_description: TTS (Text-to-Speech) converts written text into spoken audio. Different TTS services offer various voice qualities, languages, and speaking styles.
definitions.llm_description: LLM (Large Language Model) is an AI system that generates text responses. Different providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, etc.) offer varying capabilities, speeds, and costs.
definitions.memory_description:
Controls how many conversation turns are remembered. Higher values provide more context but use more tokens.

‚Ä¢ Use 'Unlimited' for full conversation history
‚Ä¢ Lower values = faster responses
‚Ä¢ Higher values = better continuity
